value:
The 2016-2017 school year has already begun!

All NYC children born in 2013 will be eligible to attend pre-K in September 2017.

The application for the 2017-2018 school year will open in early 2017.

To ensure that you will be notified about the opening of the application, please click the "request a call" button and fill out the Get in Touch form, marking the correct birth year of your child.

If your child was born in 2012 and you have not yet found a pre-K program, please contact the Pre-K Outreach Team at (212) 637-8000 regarding programs that may still have openings.

The 3-K for All application is open! If your child was born in 2014 and you live in New York City, you can apply for free, full-day, high-quality 3-K for All in School Districts 7 (South Bronx) and 23 (Brownsville, East New York, and Ocean Hill). The deadline to apply is Friday, July 14.

To find out what school district you live in, please enter your address here.

To see 3-K for All programs, click “Continue to 3-K Finder Map” below. Please check back for updates ‐ new programs may be added throughout the summer!


If you applied to Pre-K for All in Round 2 before the May 9 deadline, you must pre-register in person with your child and the required documents by Wednesday, June 28! If you have not yet received your results letter, please call 718-935-2009.

If you haven't applied to Pre-K for All yet for this fall, it’s not too late! Please click the Request a Call button below to have an Enrollment Specialist contact you about your options.

Have questions about the Pre-K Quality Snapshot? Click here for resources.
Programs that may have immediate availability
Programs that may have immediate availability
This form is only a statement of interest and not an application. An Enrollment Specialist will contact you shortly. Please visit nyc.gov/prek for more information.

Note: If your child was born in 2013, they are eligible for pre-K for the 2017-18 school year! If your child was born in 2014, they are eligible for 3-K programs for the 2017-18 school year in Districts 7 and 23.

Your submission was successful!

Do you wish to submit again for another child?
There was an error processing your submission, please try again. Please call 718-935-2009 (Monday-Friday between 8am and 6pm) to speak to a representative.

You have entered invalid information.

The form only accepts English language characters.

Please correct the information in the red fields. If you are having difficulty submitting this form, please call 718-935-2009 (Monday-Friday between 8am and 6pm) to speak to a representative.
Call (212) 637-8000 to contact an enrollment specialist between 9AM-5PM Monday-Friday
